column4: hi, the unpacking of kernel header deb package for 2.6.28-13 failed on my system with a permission denied error, and yes I executed it as root
the problem was a failing stats call on /usr/src/linux-headers-2.6.28-13/sound/pci/mixart
I looked at that file and could not believe what I saw. The output from ls -l is: ?????????? ? ?    ?        ?                ? mixart
